rooms.description: A spacious entrance area combining living space with a formal reception area, featuring high ceilings and traditional Chettinad-style design elements.
Adjacent to the main lobby, designed as a guest bedroom complete with an ensuite bathroom and Vastu-compliant layout ensuring positive energy flow.
Semi-open kitchen space integrated with dining area. The design incorporates Chettinad architectural nuances and adheres to Vastu principles for food preparation zones.

openings.description: A grand entrance door aligned as per Vastu to ensure a positive energy flow, enhanced with traditional motifs and modern locking mechanisms.
Dual garage doors for the two-car parking space, designed to accommodate ease of access while being compliant with local building norms.

rooms.description: Luxurious master suite featuring an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet and Vastu-compliant orientation for relaxation and privacy.
Comfortable bedroom with ample storage space and designed to maintain harmony in energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom ensuring balance in the duplex layout, following traditional Chettinad aesthetics along with modern design principles.
A dedicated workspace designed for productivity and relaxation; placed according to Vastu for optimal energy and focus.

openings.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom providing ample natural light, a view of the surroundings, and ensuring compliance with Vastu for enhanced well-being.
